first_para: Pamela Nash (born 24 June 1984) is a British Labour Party politician, who has been the Member of Parliament (MP) for Airdrie and Shotts since the 2010 general election.

full.extract:
Pamela Nash (born 24 June 1984) is a British Labour Party politician, who has been the Member of Parliament (MP) for Airdrie and Shotts since the 2010 general election.
In 2010 she became and still is the Baby of the House, the name given to the youngest MP in Parliament, aged just 25.
^ The Week in Westminster, BBC Radio 4, 26 June 2010
^ [1]
full.title: Pamela Nash
